metadata.name: LOVOTIC – I
metadata.description:
Conceived by Stephan Crasneanscki and composed by Soundwalk Collective, LOVOTIC is inspired by an experimental research on possibilities of sexual / emotional relationships between humans and A.I. Unidentifiable and artificial, it occupies an amorphous androgynous netherworld at the borderlands between biotic and android. Feat. Charlotte Gainsbourg, Lyra Pramuk, Atom™️, Paul B. Preciado and Willem Dafoe.

Original Artwork: Stephan Crasneanscki
Generative Algorithm: Simone Merli / Blackbirds Inc.
Sound: Soundwalk Collective

‘A statistical analysis of this non-existing word “LOVOTIC” results in a combination of the words of the English human language love, lover, loved, lovability, lovages, lovebug, lovesick, loveless, lovelocks, loveliest, lovemaking, or lovelornnesses; and asymtotic, antibiotic, enzootic, erotic, exotic, idiotic, neurotic, hypnotic, monozygotic, narcotic, patriotic, pyschotic, quixotic, robotic, semiotic, symbiotic, or zygotic (…) ' 
Paul B. Preciado
